industry: <string>, the industry sector the company operates in

products.product_id: <string>, a unique identifier for the product
products.category: <string>, the category or type of the product

carbon_footprint.total_carbon_emissions: <number>, the total carbon emissions associated with the product, typically measured in units like kg CO2e
carbon_footprint.unit: <string>, the unit of measurement for the total carbon emissions (e.g., kg CO2e)
carbon_footprint.scope_1_emissions: <number>, direct emissions from owned or controlled sources
carbon_footprint.scope_2_emissions: <number>, indirect emissions from the generation of purchased energy
carbon_footprint.scope_3_emissions: <number>, all other indirect emissions that occur in the value chain of the company, else Null

reporting_period.start_date: <date>, the start date of the reporting period
reporting_period.end_date: <date>, the end date of the reporting period

products.reference: <list of string>, a list of URLs to reference sources for the data
